name: Job Simulator Game 3D
description:
Welcome to your new job.

Buckle up because you have just entered one of the most toxic workplaces on the planet. Your boss is a psychopath and your colleagues are double crossing back stabbers always looking to make you look bad in front of the boss.


The only fresh breeze of air is Kim... the most beautiful girl you've ever seen. What is she doing in a place like this?

Start as Intern in this office from hell and see if you can outsmart your boss and colleagues. Who knows you may even win Kim's heart.

Work hard, and play even harder to come out on top.

Download now and enjoy this hilarious game for free.
